attributes.review: (p.s. if u could give it -1000 stars, I would!) NO joke I opened up this app trying to support all that our great POTUS stands for- racism, homophobia, misogyny, sexism, etc, and ALL I got were the words ‘YOU’RE UGLY’ yelled at me by a man who sounded JUST LIKE our president through my screen ... so therefore I had to come and let the people know that if you don’t want your whole life to be ruined, do NOT download this app like I did :( hurt my feels a little too much. oh and I also got greeted with racial slurs because somehow it knew that I was asian and it told me to go ‘back to my country.’ ~sigh~ I was actually born here too 🥺(heart been broke so many times <\3) but oh well, I guess I’ll just have to settle and vote for Biden in the fall. I hope you nothing but the worst trump 2020 team :) ❤️
attributes.title: Opened the App and it called me ugly :(

attributes.review: okay so i downloaded this app to see what the hype was about but i forgot that i needed to take a nap so i ran to the dollar store to get me some food for my dog but when i got home i fed my cat and the app was downloaded so i opened it and it GAVE ME A VIRUS I CANT GET RID OF but i fed my cat and i went to petsmart to buy a fish but they were out of the betas so i got a tiger instead and i went home but realized my tiger needed food so i left it at home and went to go get it food but when i came back my tiger at my cat AND my beta fish so i was really sad but came back to my phone anyways and saw the app still downloaded i IMMEDIATELY deleted it because its the ROOT OF ALL OF MY PROBLEMS i would rate this app 0 stars if i could but i cant so im rating it 1 star hopefully they delete this app because it is HORRIBLE.
attributes.title: I HATE THIS!!!!😡😡😡

attributes.review: When I first opened the app it said “add gender” I put female because I am a female and I told me to go back into the kitchen so I clicked back and put male then it told me to go back to work!!! I would give it a zero star if I could smh... don’t recommend... dont download... just... NO❤️!!! Not only that but when you are done reading the sexist insults it shows his naked pictures and him looking at his daughter in a creepy way that a dad shouldn’t be looking like that at his child... than it told me to add my face I put Mexican then it said go back to Mexico so I can build that wall, so I put my other race which is Japanese then it said don’t give me corona ugly rat, so then I put White Racist man names Henery and then it accepted it than it gave me a virus don’t not download!!!! I had to buy a new phone smh...!!!!
attributes.title: No... Horrible

attributes.review: the his app stole my information and sold it to an unknown buyer, which you’d think, eh what are they going to do, but then trump sent a hit man  to come to my house and kill me. luckily though, before he could, i managed to shove him out the window into the bush below, where he died from his injuries. as he fell, he screamed that i’d pay for that. it turns out that my dog was actually in the bush taking a wee and the hit man fell on him. my dog survived, but now he only has one leg as he had to get the other ones amputated. as i was waiting at the vet, i got on my phone to play subway surfers, but i saw that there was a notification on the trump app. i clicked on it to see what it was only to find out that trump himself had texted me “heyy wyd”🤢. never download this app.
attributes.title: Russian hit man killed my dog because of this app

attributes.review: I can’t believe no one told me this app had JUMP SCARES!! As soon as I opened the app I SAW👀 the Orange man everyone has been talking about 😡. And then he started getting too comfortable and asked for my phone number🤮🤮I also think he had some mental issues because he kept calling himself A-P-P and asked me to refer to him as an “us”. He also threatened me when I didn’t want to give him my phone number 😭and demonstrated what he was going to do to me with his fist 👊....when I told my mom about it she didn’t believe me so I showed her..... you won’t believe what happened!!😳 he started making the weirdest noises  and my mom went under some kind of hypnosis in which she couldn’t stop farting 💩 please help I don’t know what to do 💫 One thing is for sure you should not download this app 🥵
attributes.title: Farting hypnosis

attributes.review: first off, i would like to say how displeased i am with this app!!! my daughter downloaded it from the app store and started to feel dizzy. when she told me, i knew right away it was because of this hideous app. i asked her why she felt this way and she told me that when she opened the app, she saw a big ol’ naked orange orangutan!! 🤬🤬🤬 as a karen myself, i HIGHLY disapprove of this ugly creature appearing on my daughters phone screen. she is now in the hospital to get her eyes removed, stitches in her heart from a heart attack, and will need therapy FIFTY TIMES A WEEK to get the image of the hideous big ol’ naked orange orangutan out of her head 😱 i am SO VERY HIGHLY upset with this app and would not recommend it to anyone!! 🤬 please tell your children to be careful and to get this app removed from the app store IMMEDIATELY!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: big ol’ naked orange orangutan

attributes.review: To start the app took 6 hours , yes SIX hours to download , very bad for you image 😔🧚🧚 I do not recommend at all✨🤪 as I took a walk waiting for it to download , it finally finished and as I open and see the 🟠 Cheeto man I got run over by a car 🚗😔😢❤️ when he went to check on me he saw scared wittle bunker 🛌 boy 🧸and got back in his car and RAN me over AGAIN 😡😡 I had to go to the hospital and found out I am paralyzed 🤯😢🤬 not to mention the bill is HIGH and it is all Cheeto man’s fault 🤬 I got released and found my house burning up into flames 🔥😔✨ the next morning I went to check it out and the only thing untouched was a CHEETO bag 🟠🤪 I went to touch it and turned into ashes 😔😢😭😊💔 how am I writing this is a mystery 😳🤯 overall this app needs to be deleted , this is UTTERLY RIDICULOUS 😡😤😤
attributes.title: bad luck 😔✨🧚 *DEATH*

attributes.review: THIS APP SO TERRIBLE!!!! DO NOT GET! It made my phone glitch out so bad and when I tried to open it my phone went completely black and began to overheat! I tried turning it on but i had to wait an hour for it to turn back on. But during that hour my cat overdosed on catnip and I had to call the vet in advance to make an appointment but GUESS WHAT MY PHONE WASN’T TURNING ON BECAUSE OF THIS APP. My cat was heaving and stoned to the bone and I couldn’t do anything about it! I began to panic and ate all of the dinosaur chicken nuggets in my house. So now my cat was passed out AND I didn’t have any dinosaur chicken nuggets anymore. Once it did turn on I had to immediately uninstall it because this app was bringing satan into my phone and as a totally religious conservative redneck person that I am, I just can’t stand for satanism 😔.
attributes.title: this triggered my anxiety

attributes.review: This app..it needs to be terminated! My mom got diagnosed with cancer because of president orangutan’s app. She is now struggling in the hospital, barely able to breathe. My cat got diagnosed with diarrhea and now he won’t stop pooping everywhere! I tried to call somebody to help but instead president orangutan answered and laughed through the phone maniacally! What a crazy weirdo! As I rolled up to the party with my crazy pink wig, I couldn’t get through the door because my booties too big! I called 911 but instead..president orangutan answered and I heard my cat screeching through the phone. He threatened to cook my cat If I didn’t rate his app 5 stars! I couldn’t come to my cats rescue because I was stuck in the doorway!He grilled my cat and showed me proof of it..my whole family had a seizure then died. I am the last survivor.
attributes.title: Cancerous app!

attributes.review: The app was an absolute nightmare to figure out. First of all, the downloading process took ages- at least 30 minutes! Once the app finally installed, however, it crashed as soon as I tried to open it! I had to delete 2 of my other apps on my phone to make room even though my phone indeed had enough storage! If that wasn’t enough, the app itself was like a labyrinth. It was unnecessarily confusing to navigate and it would take up so much of my battery power and storage - more than the description of the app lets. It was a despicably horrid experience and I advise anyone who comes across this to click away and never look back! If this is anything to go by, Trump’s presidency is hopeless.
attributes.title: The worst possible app that could be used to advocate for a president
